long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mesha Record is an extension to tracking user actions like clicking buttons, inputting text, selecting dropdowns, etc, and generating the automation test step on the Mesha portal by on user actions. Mesha Recorder helps test engineers create automation test cases more quickly, saving the effort to build automation scenarios and easy-to-build test steps.

Homepage: https://mesha.fsoft-hcm.net
